Verses: 1 appozhudhu Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Elisaa Theerkkadharisigalin Puththiraril Oruvanai Azhaiththu: Nee Idaikkattik Kondu, Indhath Thailakkuppiyai Un Kaiyil Eduththukkondu, Keeleyaaththilulla Raamoththirkup Po.

2 nee Ange Serndhapodhu, Nimsiyin Maganaana Yosabaaththin Kumaaran Yegoo Enge Irukkiraan Endru Paarththu, Ange Utpravesiththu, Avanaith Than Sagodhararin Naduvilirundhu Ezhundhirukkappanni, Avanai Ullaana Oru Araiyile Azhaiththukkondupoi,
3 thailakkuppiyai Eduththu, Avan Thalaiyinmel Vaarththu: Unnai Isravelinmel Raajaavaaga Abishegampanninen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endru Solli, Kadhavaith Thirandhu Thaamadhiyaamal Odippo Endraan.
4 appadiye Theerkkadharisiyin Oozhiyakkaaranaagiya Andha Vaaliban Keeleyaaththilulla Raamoththirkup Ponaan.

5 avan Utpravesiththapodhu, Senaapadhigal Ange Utkaarndhirundhaargal; Appozhudhu Avan: Senaapadhiye, Umakku Sollavendiya Oru Vaarththai Undu Endraan. Adharku Yegoo: Engalellaarukkullum Yaarukku Endru Kettadharku, Avan, Senaapadhiyaagiya Umakkuththaan Endraan.

6 avan Ezhundhu, Araiveettirkul Pravesiththaan; Avan Andhath Thailaththai Avan Thalaiyinmel Vaarththu, Avanai Nokki: Isravelin Dhevanaagiyakarththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Unnaik Karththarudaiya Janamaagiya Isravelinmel Raajaavaaga Abishegampanninen.

7 naan En Oozhiyakkaararaagiya Theerkkadharisigalin Raththappazhiyaiyum, Karththarudaiya Sagala Oozhiyakkaararin Raththap Pazhiyaiyum, Yesabelin Kaiyile Vaangumpadikku Nee Un Aandavanaagiya Aagaabin Kudumbaththai Azhiththuvidakkadavaai.
8 aagaabin Kudumbamellaam Azhiyum Padikku, Naan Aagaabukku Suvaril Neer Vidum Oru Naai Mudhalaai Iraadhapadikku, Isravelile Avanudaiyavargalil Adaippattavanaiyum Vidupattavanaiyum Karuvaruththu,
9 aagaabin Kudumbaththai Nebaaththin Kumaaranaagiya Yerobeyaamin Kudumbaththukkum, Agiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Paashaavin Kudumbaththukkum Sariyaakkuven.
10 yesabelai Yesrayelin Nilaththile Naaigal Thindruvidum; Avalai Adakkampannugiravan Illaiyengiraar Endru Solli, Kadhavaith Thirandhu Odip Ponaan.

11 yegoo Than Aandavanudaiya Oozhiyakkaararidaththukkuth Thirumbivandhapodhu, Avargal Avanai Nokki: Sugaseydhiyaa? Andhap Payiththiyakkaaran Unnidaththil Vandhadhu Enna Endru Kettaargal. Adharku Avan: Andha Manushanaiyum, Avan Sonna Kaariyaththaiyum Neengal Ariveergal Endraan.

12 adharku Avargal: Adhu Poi, Adhai Engalukku Sollum Endraargal. Appozhudhu Avan: Naan Unnai Isravelinmel Raajaavaaga Abishegam Panninen Endru Karththar Uraikkiraar Endru Inna Inna Pragaaramaaga Ennidaththil Sonnaan Endraan.
13 appozhudhu Avargal Theeviramaai Avaravar Thangal Vasthiraththaip Padigalin Uyaraththil Avan Keezhe Viriththu, Ekkaalam Oodhi: Yegoo Raajaavaanaan Endraargal.

14 appadiye Nimsiyin Maganaagiya Yosabaaththin Kumaaran Yegoo Enbavan Yoraamukku Virodhamaaik Kattuppaadu Panninaan; Yoraamo Isravelar Ellaarodunkooda Keeleyaaththilulla Raamoththile Seeriyaavin Raajaavaagiya Aasagelinimiththam Kaaval Vaiththu Vaiththaan.

15 aanaalum Seeriyaavin Raajaavaagiya Aasagelode Pannina Yuththaththile, Seeriyar Thannai Vettina Kaayangalai Yesrayelile Aatrikkollugiradharku, Raajaavaagiya Yoraam Thirumbip Poyirundhaan. Yegoo Enbavan: Idhu Ungalukku Sammadhiyaayirundhaal Yesrayelil Idhai Arivikkiradharku Oruvarum Pattanaththilirundhu Thappip Pogumpadi Vidaadhirungal Endraan.
16 appozhudhu Yegoo Radhaththinmel Eri, Yesrayelukku Neraagap Ponaan, Yoraam Ange Vyaadhiyaaik Kidandhaan; Yoraamaippaarkka, Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Agasiyaavum Ange Vandhirundhaan.

17 yesrayelil Koburaththinmel Nirkira Jaamakkaaran, Yegoovin Koottam Varugiradhaik Kandu: Oru Koottaththaik Kaangiren Endraan. Appozhudhu Yoraam: Nee Oru Kudhiraiveeranaik Kooppittu, Avargalukku Edhiraaga Anuppi Samaadhaanamaa Endru Ketkachchol Endraan.

18 andhak Kudhiraiveeran: Avanukku Edhirkondupoi, Samaadhaanamaa Endru Raajaa Ketkachchonnaar Endraan. Adharku Yegoo: Samaadhaanaththaip Patri Unakku Enna? En Pirage Thirumbivaa Endraan. Appozhudhu Jaamakkaaran: Anuppappattavan Avargal Irukkum Idamattum Ponapodhilum Thirumbivaravillai Endraan.

19 aagaiyaal Veroru Kudhiraiveeranai Anuppinaan, Avan Avargalidaththil Poi: Samaadhaanamaa Endru Raajaa Ketkachchonnaar Endraan. Adharku Yegoo Samaadhaanaththaippatri Unakku Enna? En Pirage Thirumbivaa Endraan.

20 appozhudhu Jaamakkaaran: Avan Avargal Irukkum Idamattum Ponapodhilum Thirumbivaravillai Endrum, Ottugiradhu Nimsiyin Kumaaranaagiya Yegoo Ottugiradhu Pola Irukkiradhu; Adhivegamaai Ottugiraan Endrum Sonnaan.

21 appozhudhu Yoraam: Radhaththai Aayaththappaduththu Endraan; Avanudaiya Radhaththai Aayaththappaduththinapodhu, Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Yoraamum, Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Agasiyaavum Avanavan Than Than Radhaththil Eri Yegoovukku Neraagap Purappattu, Yesrayeliyanaagiya Naaboththin Nilaththile Avanukku Edhirppattaargal.

22 yoraam Yegoovaik Kandavudane: Yegoove, Samaadhaanamaa Endraan. Adharku Yegoo: Un Thaayaagiya Yesabelin Vesiththanangalum Avaludaiya Pilli Sooniyangalum, Iththanai Eraalamaayirukkaiyil Samaadhaanam Edhu Endraan.
23 appozhudhu Yoraam Than Radhaththaith Thiruppikkondu Odippoi, Agasiyaavai Nokki: Agasiyaave, Idhu Sadhi Endraan.
24 yegoo Than Kaiyaal Villai Naanetri, Ambu Yoraamudaiya Nenjil Uruvip Purappadaththakkadhaai, Avanai Avan Buyangalin Naduve Eydhaan; Adhinaal Avan Than Radhaththile Surundu Vizhundhaan.

25 appozhudhu Yegoo, Than Senaapadhiyaagiya Pidhkaarai Nokki: Avanai Eduththu, Yesrayeliyanaagiya Naaboththin Vayalnilaththil Erindhu Podu; Naanum Neeyum Oru Sodaai Avan Thagappanaagiya Aagaabin Pirage Kudhirai Eri Varugirapodhu, Karththar Indha Aakkinaiyai Avanmel Sumaththinaar Enbadhai Ninaiththukkol.

26 netru Naaboththin Raththaththaiyum, Avan Kumaararin Raththaththaiyum Kanden Allavaa Endrum, Indha Nilaththil Unakku Needhiyai Sarikkattuven Endrum Appozhudhu Karththar Sonnaare; Ippodhum Avanai Eduththu, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyinpadiye Indha Nilaththil Erindhupodu Endraan.

27 idhai Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Agasiyaa Kandu, Thottaththin Veettuvazhiyaai Odipponaan; Yegoo Avanaip Pin Thodarndhu: Avanaiyum Radhaththile Vettippodungal Endraan; Avargal Ipleyaam Kitta Irukkira Koormalaiyin Mel Erugira Vazhiyile Appadi Seydhaargal; Avan Megodhovukku Odippoi Ange Seththup Ponaan.
28 avanudaiya Oozhiyakkaarar Avanai Radhaththinmel Erusalemukkuk Kondupoi, Avanai Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththil Avan Pidhaakkalodu Avanudaiya Kallaraiyile Adakkampanninaargal.
29 indha Agasiyaa, Aagaabudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Yoraamin Padhinoraam Varushaththil Yoodhaavinmel Raajaavaanaan.
30 yegoo Yesrayelukku Vandhaan; Adhai Yesabel Kettapodhu, Than Kangalukku Maiyittu, Than Thalaiyai Singaariththukkondu, Jannalvazhiyaai Ettippaarththu,
31 yegoo Olimugavaasalil Vandhapodhu, Aval: Than Aandavanaik Kondra Simri Shemam Adaindhaanaa Endraal.
32 appozhudhu Avan Than Mugaththai Andha Jannalukku Neraaga Ereduththu: En Patchaththil Irukkiradhu Yaar? Yaar? Endru Kettadharku, Irandu Moondru Pradhaanigal Avanai Ettippaarththaargal.
33 appozhudhu Avan: Avalaik Keezhe Thallungal Endraan; Appadiye Avalaik Keezhe Thallinadhinaal, Avaludaiya Raththam Suvarilum Kudhiraigalilum Theriththadhu; Avan Avalai Midhiththuk Kondu,
34 ullepoi, Pusiththuk Kudiththapinbu: Neengal Poi Sabikkappatta Andha Sthreeyaip Paarththu, Avalai Adakkampannungal; Aval Oru Raajakumaaraththi Endraan.
35 avargal Avalai Adakkampannap Pogirapodhu, Avaludaiya Thalaiyottaiyum Kaalgalaiyum Ullankaigalaiyume Allaamal Verondraiyum Kaanavillai.

36 aagaiyaal Avargal Thirumbavandhu Avanukku Ariviththaargal; Appozhudhu Avan: Idhu Karththar Thisbiyanaagiya Eliyaa Ennum Thammudaiya Oozhiyakkaaranaik Kondu Sonna Vaarththai; Yesrayelin Nilaththile Naaigal Yesabelin Maamsaththaith Thinnum Endrum,
37 innadhu Yesabelendru Sollak Koodaadhapadikku, Yesabelin Predham Yesrayelin Nilaththile Vayalveliyinmel Podum Eruvaippol Aagum Endrum Sonnaare Endraan.
